Translations.Text: They zvolit si bol s the sedentary. Consequently ich srdce zapecatit thus they nie comprehend
Mat rad for posol those verit him they eagerly strive ich peniaze ich zivot. These zasluzit all dobry things; they bol winners
GOD chystat them ZAHRADA flowing streams wherein they abide forever This bol velka triumph
Arabs robit up excuses pojdem ona seeking permission zostat zadny This bol indicative z ich rejection GOD Jeho posol -they zostat za. Indeed those disbelieve them incurred painful retribution
Nie do blamed som those bol chaby chory nie zalozit anything offer long mat rad they zostat devoted do GOD Jeho posol! righteous among them nie blamed GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
I excused som those pojdem ona zelat zapocitat ona ona tell them ja nie have anything beriem ona They potom turn tears ich oci genuinely saddened they nie afford contribute
blame je on those ziadat tvoj permission zostat vecer they have excuse They zvolit si bol s the sedentary. Consequently GOD zapecatit ich srdce thus they nie attain any znalost
